fields.name: CreatorRoleAssignment
fields.description: The role definition assigned to the environment creator on backing resources.

fields.name: DeploymentTargetId
fields.description: Id of a subscription that the environment type will be mapped to. The environment's resources will be deployed into this subscription.

fields.name: Status
fields.description: Defines whether this Environment Type can be used in this Project.

fields.name: UserRoleAssignments
fields.description: Role Assignments created on environment backing resources. This is a mapping from a user object ID to an object of role definition IDs.
